name: ColdFusion: Avoid using cfdump without IsDebugMode
description: Report all use of cfdump without IsDebugMode.
output:
This report lists all Templates use of cfdump without IsDebugMode.
It provides the following information:
- Template full name
- Associated value is the difference between number of IsDebugMode and number of cfdump inside the Template.
rationale: For both confidentaillity and performance reasons, dump should not be exposed to end users when code is released in production.
remediation:
Add a test to check if Debug mode is on, thanks to the function IsDebugMode. It returns True if debugging mode is set in the ColdFusion Administrator; False if debugging mode is disabled.
This way you ensure that if you leave any cfdump tags in production code, they are not displayed when you disable debugging output.
